site.title: Ranieri Vannozzi - Cloud Architect | Tech Lead | Project Manager

profile.name: Ranieri Vannozzi
profile.bio: Experienced software engineer with over 15 years in enterprise application development. Passionate about clean architecture, cloud-native technologies, and scalable web platforms. Strong background in leading development teams and delivering robust B2B solutions.

metadata.meta_description: Fullstack Developer based in Italy with 15+ years of experience in enterprise software, cloud-native systems, and scalable B2B platforms.

curriculum.whoIAm: I am a project manager and technical leader with solid experience in developing enterprise software solutions. I design and implement cloud-based, mobile, advanced CRM, e-commerce systems and business management platforms, combining a clear architectural vision with a full-stack operational approach. I actively support the team in defining the architectural design and distributing tasks, promoting a shared, clear and sustainable development process. I have gained experience in coordinating work groups, encouraging collaboration and the adoption of good technical practices. With a solid and result-oriented technical approach, I transform complex requirements into effective digital solutions, selecting appropriate technologies for building integrated systems that enable innovation and foster project growth.

projects.description: Co-founded a startup focused on language learning. Designed and developed the entire front-end architecture of the platform using AngularJS, ensuring a responsive and consistent experience across web and mobile interfaces.
achievements: Designed and developed the front-end architecture using AngularJS, ensuring modularity and scalability.
Collaborated with the back-end team to integrate RESTful APIs and ensure a seamless user experience.
Contributed to the deployment of native Android and iOS apps as part of the broader multi-platform product strategy.

responsibilities: Design and development of scalable, cloud-native and serverless applications with a full-stack approach.
Architectural design, project coordination, and hands-on implementation of modern solutions leveraging AWS services such as Lambda, Cognito, S3, SES, and SST.
Frontend and backend development using HTMX, JSX/TSX, Hono Framework, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring performance, maintainability, and rapid delivery through streamlined DevOps practices.
